WorkItem.Description:
im trying the new pdf functionality, as it is very handy for me, and i want to thank for all the work you put to in this class. :)
 
but now i encountered a problem... i have a table in which some fields may occupy more than one line... when that happens, the text on the following columns in the same row will be printed in the line where the previous one ended... and the top and bottom borders are always close together with the text, messing it all up... can you help me so i can print it right?
 
i'll try to exemplify what i'm saying...
 
 
__field1______________field2___________field3_____________field4____________
31312312____|____dslksjgkjsgkjs__|__sdkjfhskjhsgfh_|___ksdfhsihsiuf______|          ----> row ok
3422353_____|  sdfs ggdsgfdsgdg |_________________|_____________________|
_______________|__gergergerger____|__ddscfsdfs______|_____egergergre_____|         -----> row with 2 lines not ok
6434535_____| ......
